reviewText: I am a longtime fan of "Hard Hat Harry" and firefighting related subjects and have owned this on tape since I was a kid. "Hard Hat Harry" is one of the best, if not the BEST kids programs aside from the "There Goes...." series hosted by Dave.
It was good for my son to watch but I think it was dirty or something because it keep moving up and down.  Hard to watch
After renting this so many times from the library, we finally had to buy it!!!
